featured.title: Personal Portfolio
featured.subtitle: Design. Code. Showcase.
featured.description: A modern, responsive portfolio built to showcase my projects, skills, and experience. Features smooth animations, a dynamic project carousel, and a clean UI focused on clarity, performance, and developer-friendly structure.

featured.title: League of Beans
featured.subtitle: Fast-paced FPS with champion-style abilities
featured.description: Open-source FPS with fast gunplay and MOBA-style champion abilities, featuring distinct characters and chaotic, skill-based arena combat.

featured.title: Men DAY
featured.subtitle: Multiplayer FPS in Active Development
featured.description: Men DAY is an open-source Unity multiplayer FPS featuring fast combat, recoil, ADS, weapon sway, and modular weapon systems. Actively developed with a growing technical foundation and multiplayer focus.

featured.title: REACTFLIX
featured.subtitle: Offline Media Streaming Platform
featured.description: REACTFLIX is a self-hosted media streaming platform built with a Flask backend and a React frontend. It supports movies and TV series, season-based posters, subtitles (Hebrew & English), pagination, genre filtering, and admin-only uploads. Designed to run fully offline on a local or internal network.
